section_title: OTHER MATTERS REFERRED TO THE COP BY THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES: IPCC Fifth Assessment Report
sentences: These discussions are summarized under the SBSTA agenda item on the IPCC AR5 (see page 21).

Work Programme on the Revision of the Guidelines for the Review of Biennial Reports and National Communications, including National Inventory Reviews, for Developed Country Parties: These discussions are summarized under the SBSTA agenda item on the Work programme on the revision of guidelines for the review of Biennial Reports and National Communications, including National Inventory Reviews, for Developed Country Parties (See page 22).
National Adaptation Plans (NAPs): These discussions are summarized under the SBI agenda item on NAPs (see page 14).
